body.raw:
# Tooling at root level

You will be learning the configuration used in this large monorepo. Read through this guide to understand how these tools work together.

## Tools used at root level:
- [.editorconfig](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/.editorconfig) 
- [.eslintrc.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/.eslintrc.json)
- [.kodiak.toml](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/.kodiak.toml)
- [.npmrc](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/.npmrc)
- [.nvmrc](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/.nvmrc)
- [.prettierignore](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/.prettierignore)
- [package.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/package.json)
- [pnpm-lock.yaml](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/pnpm-lock.yaml)
- [pnpm-workspace.yaml](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/pnpm-workspace.yaml)
- [postcss.config.cjs](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/postcss.config.cjs)
- [prettier.config.cjs](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/prettier.config.cjs)
- [tailwind.config.cjs](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/tailwind.config.cjs)
- [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/tsconfig.json)
- [turbo.json](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/turbo.json)
- [vitest.config.ts](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/blob/main/vitest.config.ts)
